常用pom

2021-05-27 

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
    <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
    <version>1.18.18</version>
</dependency>

<plugin>
    <groupId>com.google.cloud.tools</groupId>
    <artifactId>jib-maven-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.0</version>
    <configuration>
        <to>
            <image>myimage</image>
        </to>
    </configuration>
</plugin>
